description: Cd4AutoML managed end-to-end workflow with model serving REST API

S3TrainingDataPath.description: S3 Path containing training data. Data format must CSV with headers.

TargetColumnName.description: The name of the target column to be predicted. This MUST be last column in the CSV data in S3

NotificationEmail.description: Valid email address to receive email notifications.

WorkflowName.description: Unique Name or Identifier for CD4AutoML workflow

Schedule.description: Number of days before retraining AutoML model.

InferenceApi.description: REST API URI for real time model inference available once workflow is completed
